GSD.product_version: versions from v4.2 to before v4.9.334
GSD.description:
tcp: cdg: allow tcp_cdg_release() to be called multiple times

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.334 by commit 0b19171439016a8e4c97eafe543670ac86e2b8fe, it was introduced in version v4.2 by commit 2b0a8c9eee81882fc0001ccf6d9af62cdc682f9e. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: tcp: cdg: allow tcp_cdg_release() to be called multiple times
OSV.details:
